title: AI Assistant
subtitle: Get instant help with your questions
welcome: Hi! I'm Nicky's AI assistant. How can I help you today?
suggestion2: How much does a website cost?
suggestion3: Can you help with AI integration?
errorSendFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
errorNetworkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errorServerError: Server error. Please try again later.
errorMessageTooLong: Message is too long. Please shorten it.
errorEmptyMessage: Please enter a message before sending.
